sect1.title: First Level Section
sect1.para: A paragraph explaining something In this manual we will make extensive use of &entities;, to insert the contents of smaller independent files. This should help translators; any changes will be easier to find within the files. We will try to keep the files small, feel free to create new ones for new subjects or subtopics.

This example document contains some of the most useful types of xml markup for our purposes. Some quick rules:
All tags must be in lower case
Every tag must have a closing tag also
No abbreviations in the tags
and preferences:
Keep starting tags to the left margin as much as possible
Keep tag pairs intact on one line if it's reasonable to do so
The right margin will not be even, it doesn't matter
Use 1-space indentation, but don't sweat it
Try to leave a blank line between paragraph tags and the words in the paragraph (this makes word wrapping much easier)
